verses.verse: Whoever loves <S%H157><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> knowledge: <S%H1847><s%> but he that hates <S%H8130><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%> is brutish. <S%H1197><s%>
A good <S%H2896><s%> man obtains <S%H6329><s%> favor <S%H7522><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> but a man <S%H376><s%> of wicked <S%H4209><s%> devices <S%H4209><s%> will he condemn. <S%H7561><s%>
A man <S%H120><s%> shall not be established <S%H3559><s%> by wickedness: <S%H7562><s%> but the root <S%H8328><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall not be moved. <S%H4131><s%>
A virtuous <S%H2428><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> is a crown <S%H5850><s%> to her husband: <S%H1167><s%> but she that makes ashamed <S%H954><s%> is as rottenness <S%H7538><s%> in his bones. <S%H6106><s%>
The thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> are right: <S%H4941><s%> but the counsels <S%H8458><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are deceit. <S%H4820><s%>
The words <S%H1697><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are to lie in wait <S%H693><s%> for blood: <S%H1818><s%> but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> them.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> are overthrown, <S%H2015><s%> and are not: but the house <S%H1004><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall stand. <S%H5975><s%>
A man <S%H376><s%> shall be commended <S%H1984><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his wisdom: <S%H7922><s%> but he that is of a perverse <S%H5753><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> shall be despised. <S%H937><s%>
He that is despised, <S%H7034><s%> and has a servant, <S%H5650><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than he that honors <S%H3513><s%> himself, and lacks <S%H2638><s%> bread. <S%H3899><s%>
A righteous <S%H6662><s%> man regards <S%H3045><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> of his beast: <S%H929><s%> but the tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are cruel. <S%H394><s%>

He that tills <S%H5647><s%> his land <S%H127><s%> shall be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with bread: <S%H3899><s%> but he that follows <S%H7291><s%> vain <S%H7386><s%> persons is void <S%H2638><s%> of understanding. <S%H3820><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> desires <S%H2530><s%> the net <S%H4686><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> men: but the root <S%H8328><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> yields <S%H5414><s%> fruit.
The wicked <S%H7451><s%> is snared <S%H4170><s%> by the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of his lips: <S%H8193><s%> but the just <S%H6662><s%> shall come <S%H3318><s%> out of trouble. <S%H6869><s%>

A man <S%H376><s%> shall be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with good <S%H2896><s%> by the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of his mouth: <S%H6310><s%> and the recompense <S%H1576><s%> of a man's <S%H120><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be rendered <S%H7725><s%> to him.
The way <S%H1870><s%> of a fool <S%H191><s%> is right <S%H3477><s%> in his own eyes: <S%H5869><s%> but he that listens <S%H8085><s%> to counsel <S%H6098><s%> is wise. <S%H2450><s%>
A fool's <S%H191><s%> wrath <S%H3708><s%> is presently <S%H3117><s%> known: <S%H3045><s%> but a prudent <S%H6175><s%> man covers <S%H3680><s%> shame. <S%H7036><s%>
He that speaks <S%H6315><s%> truth <S%H530><s%> shows <S%H5046><s%> forth righteousness: <S%H6664><s%> but a false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> deceit. <S%H4820><s%>
There is that speaks <S%H981><s%> like the piercings <S%H4094><s%> of a sword: <S%H2719><s%> but the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> is health. <S%H4832><s%>
The lip <S%H8193><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> for ever: <S%H5703><s%> but a lying <S%H8367><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> is but for a moment. <S%H7281><s%>
Deceit <S%H4820><s%> is in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of them that imagine <S%H2790><s%> evil: <S%H7451><s%> but to the counsellors <S%H3289><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> is joy. <S%H8057><s%>
There shall no <S%H3808><s%> evil <S%H205><s%> happen <S%H579><s%> to the just: <S%H6662><s%> but the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with mischief. <S%H7451><s%>
Lying <S%H8367><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> are abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> but they that deal <S%H6213><s%> truly <S%H530><s%> are his delight. <S%H7522><s%>
A prudent <S%H6175><s%> man <S%H120><s%> conceals <S%H3680><s%> knowledge: <S%H1847><s%> but the heart <S%H3820><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> proclaims <S%H7121><s%> foolishness. <S%H200><s%>
The hand <S%H3027><s%> of the diligent <S%H2742><s%> shall bear <S%H4910><s%> rule: <S%H4910><s%> but the slothful <S%H7423><s%> shall be under tribute. <S%H4522><s%>
Heaviness <S%H1674><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of man <S%H376><s%> makes it stoop: <S%H7812><s%> but a good <S%H2896><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> makes it glad. <S%H8056><s%>
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> is more excellent <S%H8446><s%> than his neighbor: <S%H7453><s%> but the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> seduces <S%H8582><s%> them.

The slothful <S%H7423><s%> man roasts <S%H2760><s%> not that which he took in hunting: <S%H6718><s%> but the substance <S%H1952><s%> of a diligent <S%H2742><s%> man <S%H120><s%> is precious. <S%H3368><s%>
In the way <S%H734><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%> is life: <S%H2416><s%> and in the pathway <S%H1870><s%> <S%H5410><s%> thereof there is no <S%H408><s%> death. <S%H4194><s%>
